``` ## `errors` ```ts const { form, errors, setError, setErrors, resetError, resetErrors } = createForm({ schema, initialValues, onSubmit }) {#if $errors.name} {$errors.name} {/if} setError('name', 'Nome inv치lido') setErrors({ name: 'Nome inv치lido', email: 'Email inv치lido' }) resetError('name') resetErrors() ``` ## `watch` ```ts const { form, watch } = createForm({ schema, initialValues, onSubmit }) {#if $watch.name} {$watch.name} {/if} ``` ## `updateField` ```ts const { form, updateField } = createForm({ schema, initialValues, onSubmit }) updateField('name', 'Name') updateField('email', 'Email') ou updateField('name', e.target.value)} /> updateField('email', e.target.value)} /> ``` ## `updateFields` ```ts const { form, updateFields } = createForm({ schema, initialValues, onSubmit }) updateFields({ name: 'Name', email: 'Email' }) ou updateFields({ name: e.target.value })} /> updateFields({ email: e.target.value })} /> ``` ## `getValue` ```ts const { form, getValue } = createForm({ schema, initialValues, onSubmit });
